setups.suggest: In most cases, you will have best stats on Jeronimo’s raw stats, so using equal formation with slightly more marksmen troops works the best
Mainly for people that didn’t go for Jeronimo yet, and giving opportunity to use Jero for joining rallies
For f2p, recommended is to always use best 3 heroes you have for calling rally, in Gen1 it’s Sergey Molly Bahiti
Alonso will boost damage a lot due to his widget. From Gen2 and up, you will always be either Jero or Natalia
Use Natalia in Gen2+ only if Jeronimo is not maxed stars and widget level
No f2p hero with rally widget yet, so equal formation with slightly more marksman troops
Natalia performed better in Gen3 thanks to 2 lethality widgets and 1 attack widget
Use Jeronimo instead if Natalia is not max stars and widgets
Gen3 gives you your first rally widget hero, a good time to try new formations
Again, 2x Lethality and 1x Attack widget. 30 percent Lancer troops will do great with Reina’s 3rd skill especially since Lancers are FC 5
Using Natalia if she has better star and widget level. Lynn’s 3rd skill works for you
Same reason as above. Lynn’s 3rd skill works best if you focus on heavy marksman formation
In Gen5 you can retire Alonso. Gwen has same widget but better hero skills. Heavy marksman formation works well
Even though Hector is Infantry, he has 2 damage skills that work great for marksman troops
Hector will replace Flint for rally. You can safely use up to 20 percent Infantry
Even without rally widget, Wayne’s crit rate skill gives better total rally damage than Gwen
Mia’s skills can boost Wayne’s damage even more if luck is on your side
Due to Renee skills, you need 20 percent Lancers or her damage boost is lost
Bradley is latest gen hero that has highest stats for Marksman troops. You will have a huge Marksman attack stat
This comp allows Bradley and Mia to join other people’s rallies while you keep this rally strong
Bradley gives highest stats, while Mia boosts Marksman Attack even higher
Sonya works only for lancer troops so not ideal for bear trap. Hendrik mainly defensive so not good for rally lead
If Mia isn’t maxed, use Sonya with 30 percent Lancers for her skills to have impact
Hector still better than newest gen hero for bear trap rally
Fred not compatible with Bradley. Xura focuses on opponent troops so not good for bear hunt rally
Same as P2W bear hunt. If you do not have Jeronimo yet, you can use Magnus for rally lead, but after buff hero hectro skill maybe Hector is still better
You get Fred in Gen 9 but Mia has better skills and highest widget level for damage scaling here
Blanchette is a masterpiece hero since all her skills boost damage. Freya not recommended here
Almost same as P2W bear hunt. If you do not have Jeronimo use Gregory. Some say Gregory performs better but after buff hero hectro skill maybe Hector is still better
Blanchette appears in lucky wheels and has insane damage for bear trap rally
